pullRequest.title: Rework Source structure
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR creates the basic structure to allow for a user to dynamically create and remove Source Panes within the main window. It is the first step of this process and adds no functional changes.
SourceShim and SourceBuildHelper were classes previously used in initializing Source and SourcePane that required initialization information to be known at compile time which is no longer feasible as users will be able to add/remove columns. These classes have been removed with their logic being moved to Source.java and SourcePane.java.
This PR has been through a preliminary QA review. It is related to the set of enhancements mentioned in #6428.
